system.requirements: ,Command +10, Lasgun Volley Talent. Apt: Ballistic Skill, Leadership
system.descriptionText:
Character chooses one or more of their Comrades in Cohesion to Participate in this Order if they have more than one, each uses a Full Action to do so.
Make a -10 Command Test, with +10 per Comrade Participating, if successful the Character's next ranged attack this turn gains Concussive(X), where X is equal to the number of Degrees of Success on test. Can only use this order once per combat Encounter.

description.value: Character chooses one or more of their Comrades in Cohesion to Participate in this Order if they have more than one, each uses a Full Action to do so. Make a -10 Command Test, with +10 per Comrade Participating, if successful the Character's next ranged attack this turn gains Concussive(X), where X is equal to the number of Degrees of Success on test. Can only use this order once per combat Encounter.
